posts.post_content: First time poster here. I’m looking to add to my N28 Allen & Ginter baseball set. I already have Joseph Mulvey. Probably looking to add either Charles Bennett or RL Caruthers given my current budget, but happy to see any N28 baseball available.
I have loads of NON-baseball if you are interested.
Thanks, I’m only planning to collect the baseball players at this point. I’ll let you know if I decide to work on the entire set.
